abstract: The chief executive of Oracle, Larry Ellison, is expected to present his new co-president, the former C.E.O. of Hewlett-Packard, Mark V. Hurd, to investors on Thursday.
snippet: The chief executive of Oracle, Larry Ellison, is expected to present his new co-president, the former C.E.O. of Hewlett-Packard, Mark V. Hurd, to investors on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: The chief executive of Oracle, Larry Ellison, is expected to present his new co-president, the former C.E.O. of Hewlett-Packard, Mark V. Hurd, to investors on Thursday as the world’s third largest software company reports what analysts believe will be a solid increase in earnings in the face of a faltering recovery in technology spending.

headline.main: Hurd to Comment on Oracle Move?
